desc: Welcome to Oorja Bars! Oorja is an award-winning, tasty, & a different protein bar. It can help build muscle, replace meals, or meet dietary needs. Natural, non-GMO, & Gluten-free. Oorja has the highest combination of protein & fiber compared to leading natural bars. Lower sodium, lower net carbs, & lower sugar.

layout.text: Natural Protein Bar with Unprecedented Nutrition & Taste
